VoiceDir3.BAE4.Sor: Somewhat condescending, but also legitimately disappointed.
Line3.BAE4.Sor: You had a second chance and you wasted it. Shame.
Line3.BAE4.Rog: You had a chance to get out of the life. What a waste.
Line3.BAE4.Nec: A foolish end for a foolish little man.
Line3.BAE4.Dru: What a waste of a second chance at life.
VoiceDir3.BAE4.Rog: Legitimately disappointed. Seeing someone you identify with on some level make the worlds worst decision.
VoiceDir3.BAE4.Bar: Disgusted, condescending. There is nothing lower in the world than an oath breaker.
Line3.BAE4.Bar: He died a fitting death for an oath breaker.
